name: OneLouder
tag_list: social, mobile, apps, developer, apple, android, google, ios, iphone, ipad, twitter, facebook
overview:
OneLouder is a mobile app company creating a new breakthrough category of social apps. Drawing from social and crowd-sourced content, as well as digital news and entertainment sources, OneLouder delivers content in a new way that users can more easily manage based on their specific interests.

OneLouder powers three of the top 10 social apps in Android Market and was named a Top Developer by Google. The company is also a leading developer for iOS, BlackBerry, Windows Phone and other major mobile platforms.

The company’s suite of social apps include:

TweetCaster is the company’s flagship Twitter app used by millions around the world. It is the #1 way to use Twitter on mobile other than Twitter itself and is the most feature-rich Twitter application on the market. www.tweetcaster.com

FriendCaster is the #1 third-party Facebook app on Android and iPad. It is the only Facebook app with photo editing capabilities built in. www.friendcasterapp.com

SportCaster was the very first sports application developed to deliver live sports with a social voice. The app brings together live scores, stats, and schedules with live filtered commentary through Twitter. Top #3 Sports app in Android Market. www.sportcasterapp.com

ChannelCaster is the first app that enables smartphone and tablet users to create and broadcast their own Channels by combining news and entertainment from thousands of dynamic sources like Twitter, YouTube, Flickr, news websites, and blogs. www.channelcasterapp.com

BaconReader is the best new Reddit app for Android. www.baconreader.com

OneLouder is a wholly owned subsidiary of Handmark, a world-leading developer and distributor of mobile applications.
